text: kavuna evari hrdayalalo rogam (kapatyam) undo varu, vari sangatyam koraku poti padutunnadi nivu custunnavu. Varu: "Mapai edaina apada ragaladani memu bhayapadutunnamu." Ani antaru. Bahusa allah (visvasulaku) vijayanni gani, leda tana dikku nundi edaina avakasanni gani kaligincavaccu! Appudu varu tama manas'sulalo daci uncina daniki pascattapa padataru
